topic.title: Residential Care Home Rate - conformance rules

section.p: Contains the monthly rate being paid for residential care home stay based on the effective date.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] duration with data type Time Interval
Effective date range during which the particular montly rate for the Residential Care Home is used.

Contains exactly one [1..1] monthlyRatePaid with data type Monetary Amount
Monthly rate paid while in home.

Contains exactly one [1..1] duration with data type Time Interval
Effective date range during which the particular montly rate for the Residential Care Home is used.

Contains exactly one [1..1] monthlyRatePaid with data type Monetary Amount
Monthly rate paid while in home.
